about_the_game:
Finally, after years of uncertainty, the joke has become a reality. Manlea is real. Manlea is mighty. Manlea is powerful. And Manlea can finally be experienced in the CrossWorlds. Be strong, be full of muscles. We heard you. You wanted to play as a male character in your fictious MMORPG, role-play as a gallant and manly hero who saves the world. Be manlier. Be Manlea. Alright. Now we're out of jokes.

Warning: Buy this DLC at your own risk. It does not change the gameplay. It just unlocks Manlea as a possible Skin. That's it. It might make you manly. It might not. If you buy it, it's your own fault. It does not change the gameplay or dialogues.
detailed_description:
Finally, after years of uncertainty, the joke has become a reality. Manlea is real. Manlea is mighty. Manlea is powerful. And Manlea can finally be experienced in the CrossWorlds. Be strong, be full of muscles. We heard you. You wanted to play as a male character in your fictious MMORPG, role-play as a gallant and manly hero who saves the world. Be manlier. Be Manlea. Alright. Now we're out of jokes.

Warning: Buy this DLC at your own risk. It does not change the gameplay. It just unlocks Manlea as a possible Skin. That's it. It might make you manly. It might not. If you buy it, it's your own fault. It does not change the gameplay or dialogues.

All other trademarks are the property of their respective owners and used under license. The Chinese version of CrossCode is published by WhisperGames. The Japanese version of CrossCode is published by DANGEN Entertainment. The Korean version of CrossCode is published by Mayflower Entertainment.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Yes
  • Processor: Something less than 7 years old please
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Yes
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Many can fit
  • Processor: Something newer is king
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Yes³
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Processor: If it runs OS X, should be fine
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Yes
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: What followed after X anyways?
  • Processor: If it runs anything beyond X, you're good to go
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Yes²
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: CrossCode Manlea Skin

  • Processor: Anything newer is manlier
